00050 static const char *bmo_error_messages[] = {
00051     NULL,
00052     "Self intersection error",
00053     "Could not dissolve vert",
00054     "Could not connect vertices",
00055     "Could not traverse mesh",
00056     "Could not dissolve faces",
00057     "Could not dissolve vertices",
00058     "Tessellation error",
00059     "Can not deal with non-manifold geometry",
00060     "Invalid selection",
00061     "Internal mesh error",

00065 /* operator slot type information - size of one element of the type given. */
00066 const int BMO_OPSLOT_TYPEINFO[BMO_OP_SLOT_TOTAL_TYPES] = {
00067     0,                      /*  0: BMO_OP_SLOT_SENTINEL */
00068     sizeof(int),            /*  1: BMO_OP_SLOT_BOOL */ 
00069     sizeof(int),            /*  2: BMO_OP_SLOT_INT */ 
00070     sizeof(float),          /*  3: BMO_OP_SLOT_FLT */ 
00071     sizeof(void *),         /*  4: BMO_OP_SLOT_PNT */ 
00072     sizeof(void *),         /*  5: BMO_OP_SLOT_PNT */
00073     0,                      /*  6: unused */
00074     0,                      /*  7: unused */
00075     sizeof(float) * 3,      /*  8: BMO_OP_SLOT_VEC */
00076     sizeof(void *),         /*  9: BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF */
00077     sizeof(BMOElemMapping)  /* 10: BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING */
00078 };

00080 /* Dummy slot so there is something to return when slot name lookup fails */
00081 static BMOpSlot BMOpEmptySlot = {0};
00082 
00083 void BMO_op_flag_enable(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const int op_flag)
00084 {
00085     op->flag |= op_flag;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void BMO_op_flag_disable(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const int op_flag)
00089 {
00090     op->flag &= ~op_flag;
00091 }
00092 
00098 void BMO_push(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *UNUSED(op))
00099 {
00100     bm->stackdepth++;
00101 
00102     /* add flag layer, if appropriate */
00103     if (bm->stackdepth > 1)
00104         bmo_flag_layer_alloc(bm);
00105     else
00106         bmo_flag_layer_clear(bm);
00107 }
00108 
00116 void BMO_pop(BMesh *bm)
00117 {
00118     if (bm->stackdepth > 1)
00119         bmo_flag_layer_free(bm);
00120 
00121     bm->stackdepth--;
00122 }
00123 
00129 void BMO_op_init(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *opname)
00130 {
00131     int i, opcode = bmo_opname_to_opcode(opname);
00132 
00133 #ifdef DEBUG
00134     BM_ELEM_INDEX_VALIDATE(bm, "pre bmo", opname);
00135 #else
00136     (void)bm;
00137 #endif
00138 
00139     if (opcode == -1) {
00140         opcode = 0; /* error!, already printed, have a better way to handle this? */
00141     }
00142 
00143     memset(op, 0, sizeof(BMOperator));
00144     op->type = opcode;
00145     op->flag = opdefines[opcode]->flag;
00146     
00147     /* initialize the operator slot types */
00148     for (i = 0; opdefines[opcode]->slottypes[i].type; i++) {
00149         op->slots[i].slottype = opdefines[opcode]->slottypes[i].type;
00150         op->slots[i].index = i;
00151     }
00152 
00153     /* callback */
00154     op->exec = opdefines[opcode]->exec;
00155 
00156     /* memarena, used for operator's slot buffers */
00157     op->arena = BLI_memarena_new(BLI_MEMARENA_STD_BUFSIZE, __func__);
00158     BLI_memarena_use_calloc(op->arena);
00159 }
00160 
00170 void BMO_op_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00171 {
00172     
00173     BMO_push(bm, op);
00174 
00175     if (bm->stackdepth == 2)
00176         bmesh_edit_begin(bm, op->flag);
00177     op->exec(bm, op);
00178     
00179     if (bm->stackdepth == 2)
00180         bmesh_edit_end(bm, op->flag);
00181     
00182     BMO_pop(bm);
00183 }
00184 
00190 void BMO_op_finish(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00191 {
00192     BMOpSlot *slot;
00193     int i;
00194 
00195     for (i = 0; opdefines[op->type]->slottypes[i].type; i++) {
00196         slot = &op->slots[i];
00197         if (slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING) {
00198             if (slot->data.ghash)
00199                 BLI_ghash_free(slot->data.ghash, NULL, NULL);
00200         }
00201     }
00202 
00203     BLI_memarena_free(op->arena);
00204 
00205 #ifdef DEBUG
00206     BM_ELEM_INDEX_VALIDATE(bm, "post bmo", opdefines[op->type]->name);
00207 #else
00208     (void)bm;
00209 #endif
00210 }
00211 
00217 int BMO_slot_exists(BMOperator *op, const char *slotname)
00218 {
00219     int slotcode = bmo_name_to_slotcode(opdefines[op->type], slotname);
00220     return (slotcode >= 0);
00221 }
00222 
00228 BMOpSlot *BMO_slot_get(BMOperator *op, const char *slotname)
00229 {
00230     int slotcode = bmo_name_to_slotcode_check(opdefines[op->type], slotname);
00231 
00232     if (slotcode < 0) {
00233         return &BMOpEmptySlot;
00234     }
00235 
00236     return &(op->slots[slotcode]);
00237 }
00238 
00244 void BMO_slot_copy(BMOperator *source_op, BMOperator *dest_op, const char *src, const char *dst)
00245 {
00246     BMOpSlot *source_slot = BMO_slot_get(source_op, src);
00247     BMOpSlot *dest_slot = BMO_slot_get(dest_op, dst);
00248 
00249     if (source_slot == dest_slot)
00250         return;
00251 
00252     if (source_slot->slottype != dest_slot->slottype) {
00253         /* possibly assert here? */
00254         return;
00255     }
00256 
00257     if (dest_slot->slottype  == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF) {
00258         /* do buffer copy */
00259         dest_slot->data.buf = NULL;
00260         dest_slot->len = source_slot->len;
00261         if (dest_slot->len) {
00262             const int slot_alloc_size = BMO_OPSLOT_TYPEINFO[dest_slot->slottype] * dest_slot->len;
00263             dest_slot->data.buf = BLI_memarena_alloc(dest_op->arena, slot_alloc_size);
00264             memcpy(dest_slot->data.buf, source_slot->data.buf, slot_alloc_size);
00265         }
00266     }
00267     else if (dest_slot->slottype  == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING) {
00268         GHashIterator it;
00269         BMOElemMapping *srcmap, *dstmap;
00270 
00271         /* sanity check */
00272         if (!source_slot->data.ghash) {
00273             return;
00274         }
00275 
00276         if (!dest_slot->data.ghash) {
00277             dest_slot->data.ghash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "bmesh operator 2");
00278         }
00279 
00280         BLI_ghashIterator_init(&it, source_slot->data.ghash);
00281         for ( ; (srcmap = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(&it));
00282               BLI_ghashIterator_step(&it))
00283         {
00284             dstmap = BLI_memarena_alloc(dest_op->arena, sizeof(*dstmap) + srcmap->len);
00285 
00286             dstmap->element = srcmap->element;
00287             dstmap->len = srcmap->len;
00288             memcpy(dstmap + 1, srcmap + 1, srcmap->len);
00289 
00290             BLI_ghash_insert(dest_slot->data.ghash, dstmap->element, dstmap);
00291         }
00292     }
00293     else {
00294         dest_slot->data = source_slot->data;
00295     }
00296 }

00304 void BMO_slot_float_set(BMOperator *op, const char *slotname, const float f)
00305 {
00306     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00307     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_FLT);
00308     if (!(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_FLT))
00309         return;
00310 
00311     slot->data.f = f;
00312 }

00334 /* only supports square mats */
00335 void BMO_slot_mat_set(BMOperator *op, const char *slotname, const float *mat, int size)
00336 {
00337     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00338     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAT);
00339     if (!(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAT))
00340         return;
00341 
00342     slot->len = 4;
00343     slot->data.p = BLI_memarena_alloc(op->arena, sizeof(float) * 4 * 4);
00344     
00345     if (size == 4) {
00346         memcpy(slot->data.p, mat, sizeof(float) * 4 * 4);
00347     }
00348     else if (size == 3) {
00349         copy_m4_m3(slot->data.p, (float (*)[3])mat);
00350     }
00351     else {
00352         fprintf(stderr, "%s: invalid size argument %d (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__, size);
00353 
00354         memset(slot->data.p, 0, sizeof(float) * 4 * 4);
00355     }
00356 }
00357

00450 /*
00451  * BMO_COUNTFLAG
00452  *
00453  * Counts the number of elements of a certain type that have a
00454  * specific flag enabled (or disabled if test_for_enabled is false).
00455  *
00456  */
00457 
00458 static int bmo_mesh_flag_count(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const short oflag,
00459                                const short test_for_enabled)
00460 {
00461     const char iter_types[3] = {BM_VERTS_OF_MESH,
00462                                 BM_EDGES_OF_MESH,
00463                                 BM_FACES_OF_MESH};
00464 
00465     const char flag_types[3] = {BM_VERT, BM_EDGE, BM_FACE};
00466 
00467     BMIter iter;
00468     int count = 0;
00469     BMElemF *ele_f;
00470     int i;
00471 
00472     BLI_assert(ELEM(TRUE, FALSE, test_for_enabled));
00473 
00474     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00475         if (htype & flag_types[i]) {
00476             BM_ITER_MESH (ele_f, &iter, bm, iter_types[i]) {
00477                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test_bool(bm, ele_f, oflag) == test_for_enabled)
00478                     count++;
00479             }
00480         }
00481     }
00482 
00483     return count;
00484 }
00485 
00486 
00487 int BMO_mesh_enabled_flag_count(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const short oflag)
00488 {
00489     return bmo_mesh_flag_count(bm, htype, oflag, TRUE);
00490 }
00491 
00492 int BMO_mesh_disabled_flag_count(BMesh *bm, const char htype, const short oflag)
00493 {
00494     return bmo_mesh_flag_count(bm, htype, oflag, FALSE);
00495 }
00496 
00497 void BMO_mesh_flag_disable_all(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *UNUSED(op), const char htype, const short oflag)
00498 {
00499     const char iter_types[3] = {BM_VERTS_OF_MESH,
00500                                 BM_EDGES_OF_MESH,
00501                                 BM_FACES_OF_MESH};
00502 
00503     const char flag_types[3] = {BM_VERT, BM_EDGE, BM_FACE};
00504 
00505     BMIter iter;
00506     BMElemF *ele;
00507     int i;
00508 
00509     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00510         if (htype & flag_types[i]) {
00511             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, iter_types[i]) {
00512                 BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, ele, oflag);
00513             }
00514         }
00515     }
00516 }

00518 int BMO_slot_buffer_count(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const char *slotname)
00519 {
00520     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00521     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00522     
00523     /* check if its actually a buffer */
00524     if (slot->slottype != BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF)
00525         return 0;
00526 
00527     return slot->len;
00528 }
00529 
00530 int BMO_slot_map_count(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const char *slotname)
00531 {
00532     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00533     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING);
00534     
00535     /* check if its actually a buffer */
00536     if (!(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING))
00537         return 0;
00538 
00539     return slot->data.ghash ? BLI_ghash_size(slot->data.ghash) : 0;
00540 }
00541 
00542 /* inserts a key/value mapping into a mapping slot.  note that it copies the
00543  * value, it doesn't store a reference to it. */
00544 
00545 void BMO_slot_map_insert(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00546                          void *element, void *data, int len)
00547 {
00548     BMOElemMapping *mapping;
00549     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00550     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING);
00551 
00552     mapping = (BMOElemMapping *) BLI_memarena_alloc(op->arena, sizeof(*mapping) + len);
00553 
00554     mapping->element = (BMHeader *) element;
00555     mapping->len = len;
00556     memcpy(mapping + 1, data, len);
00557 
00558     if (!slot->data.ghash) {
00559         slot->data.ghash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "bmesh slot map hash");
00560     }
00561 
00562     BLI_ghash_insert(slot->data.ghash, element, mapping);
00563 }

00565 #if 0
00566 void *bmo_slot_buffer_grow(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, int slotcode, int totadd)
00567 {
00568     BMOpSlot *slot = &op->slots[slotcode];
00569     void *tmp;
00570     ssize_t allocsize;
00571     
00572     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00573 
00574     /* check if its actually a buffer */
00575     if (slot->slottype != BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF)
00576         return NULL;
00577 
00578     if (slot->flag & BMOS_DYNAMIC_ARRAY) {
00579         if (slot->len >= slot->size) {
00580             slot->size = (slot->size + 1 + totadd) * 2;
00581 
00582             allocsize = BMO_OPSLOT_TYPEINFO[opdefines[op->type]->slottypes[slotcode].type] * slot->size;
00583 
00584             tmp = slot->data.buf;
00585             slot->data.buf = MEM_callocN(allocsize, "opslot dynamic array");
00586             memcpy(slot->data.buf, tmp, allocsize);
00587             MEM_freeN(tmp);
00588         }
00589 
00590         slot->len += totadd;
00591     }
00592     else {
00593         slot->flag |= BMOS_DYNAMIC_ARRAY;
00594         slot->len += totadd;
00595         slot->size = slot->len + 2;
00596 
00597         allocsize = BMO_OPSLOT_TYPEINFO[opdefines[op->type]->slottypes[slotcode].type] * slot->len;
00598 
00599         tmp = slot->data.buf;
00600         slot->data.buf = MEM_callocN(allocsize, "opslot dynamic array");
00601         memcpy(slot->data.buf, tmp, allocsize);
00602     }
00603 
00604     return slot->data.buf;
00605 }
00606 #endif
00607 
00608 void BMO_slot_map_to_flag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00609                           const char htype, const short oflag)
00610 {
00611     GHashIterator it;
00612     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00613     BMElemF *ele_f;
00614 
00615     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING);
00616 
00617     /* sanity check */
00618     if (!slot->data.ghash) return;
00619 
00620     BLI_ghashIterator_init(&it, slot->data.ghash);
00621     for ( ; (ele_f = BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(&it)); BLI_ghashIterator_step(&it)) {
00622         if (ele_f->head.htype & htype) {
00623             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, ele_f, oflag);
00624         }
00625     }
00626 }
00627 
00628 static void *bmo_slot_buffer_alloc(BMOperator *op, const char *slotname, int len)
00629 {
00630     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00631     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00632 
00633     /* check if its actually a buffer */
00634     if (slot->slottype != BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF)
00635         return NULL;
00636     
00637     slot->len = len;
00638     if (len)
00639         slot->data.buf = BLI_memarena_alloc(op->arena, BMO_OPSLOT_TYPEINFO[slot->slottype] * len);
00640     return slot->data.buf;
00641 }
00642 
00648 static void BMO_slot_buffer_from_all(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname, const char htype)
00649 {
00650     BMOpSlot *output = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00651     int totelement = 0, i = 0;
00652     
00653     if (htype & BM_VERT) totelement += bm->totvert;
00654     if (htype & BM_EDGE) totelement += bm->totedge;
00655     if (htype & BM_FACE) totelement += bm->totface;
00656 
00657     if (totelement) {
00658         BMIter iter;
00659         BMHeader *ele;
00660 
00661         bmo_slot_buffer_alloc(op, slotname, totelement);
00662 
00663         /* TODO - collapse these loops into one */
00664 
00665         if (htype & BM_VERT) {
00666             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00667                 ((BMHeader **)output->data.p)[i] = ele;
00668                 i++;
00669             }
00670         }
00671 
00672         if (htype & BM_EDGE) {
00673             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00674                 ((BMHeader **)output->data.p)[i] = ele;
00675                 i++;
00676             }
00677         }
00678 
00679         if (htype & BM_FACE) {
00680             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00681                 ((BMHeader **)output->data.p)[i] = ele;
00682                 i++;
00683             }
00684         }
00685     }
00686 }
00687 
00694 static void bmo_slot_buffer_from_hflag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00695                                        const char htype, const char hflag,
00696                                        const short test_for_enabled)
00697 {
00698     BMOpSlot *output = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00699     int totelement = 0, i = 0;
00700 
00701     BLI_assert(ELEM(TRUE, FALSE, test_for_enabled));
00702 
00703     if (test_for_enabled)
00704         totelement = BM_mesh_elem_hflag_count_enabled(bm, htype, hflag, TRUE);
00705     else
00706         totelement = BM_mesh_elem_hflag_count_disabled(bm, htype, hflag, TRUE);
00707 
00708     if (totelement) {
00709         BMIter iter;
00710         BMElem *ele;
00711 
00712         bmo_slot_buffer_alloc(op, slotname, totelement);
00713 
00714         /* TODO - collapse these loops into one */
00715 
00716         if (htype & BM_VERT) {
00717             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00718                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) &&
00719                     BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag) == test_for_enabled)
00720                 {
00721                     ((BMElem **)output->data.p)[i] = ele;
00722                     i++;
00723                 }
00724             }
00725         }
00726 
00727         if (htype & BM_EDGE) {
00728             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00729                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) &&
00730                     BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag) == test_for_enabled)
00731                 {
00732                     ((BMElem **)output->data.p)[i] = ele;
00733                     i++;
00734                 }
00735             }
00736         }
00737 
00738         if (htype & BM_FACE) {
00739             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00740                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(ele, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) &&
00741                     BM_elem_flag_test_bool(ele, hflag) == test_for_enabled)
00742                 {
00743                     ((BMElem **)output->data.p)[i] = ele;
00744                     i++;
00745                 }
00746             }
00747         }
00748     }
00749     else {
00750         output->len = 0;
00751     }
00752 }
00753 
00754 void BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_hflag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00755                                         const char htype, const char hflag)
00756 {
00757     bmo_slot_buffer_from_hflag(bm, op, slotname, htype, hflag, TRUE);
00758 }
00759 
00760 void BMO_slot_buffer_from_disabled_hflag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00761                                          const char htype, const char hflag)
00762 {
00763     bmo_slot_buffer_from_hflag(bm, op, slotname, htype, hflag, FALSE);
00764 }
00765 
00769 void BMO_slot_buffer_append(BMOperator *output_op, const char *output_slot_name,
00770                             BMOperator *other_op, const char *other_slot_name)
00771 {
00772     BMOpSlot *output_slot = BMO_slot_get(output_op, output_slot_name);
00773     BMOpSlot *other_slot = BMO_slot_get(other_op, other_slot_name);
00774 
00775     BLI_assert(output_slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF &&
00776                other_slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00777 
00778     if (output_slot->len == 0) {
00779         /* output slot is empty, copy rather than append */
00780         BMO_slot_copy(other_op, output_op, other_slot_name, output_slot_name);
00781     }
00782     else if (other_slot->len != 0) {
00783         int elem_size = BMO_OPSLOT_TYPEINFO[output_slot->slottype];
00784         int alloc_size = elem_size * (output_slot->len + other_slot->len);
00785         /* allocate new buffer */
00786         void *buf = BLI_memarena_alloc(output_op->arena, alloc_size);
00787 
00788         /* copy slot data */
00789         memcpy(buf, output_slot->data.buf, elem_size * output_slot->len);
00790         memcpy(((char *)buf) + elem_size * output_slot->len, other_slot->data.buf, elem_size * other_slot->len);
00791 
00792         output_slot->data.buf = buf;
00793         output_slot->len += other_slot->len;
00794     }
00795 }
00796 
00803 static void bmo_slot_buffer_from_flag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00804                                       const char htype, const short oflag,
00805                                       const short test_for_enabled)
00806 {
00807     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00808     int totelement, i = 0;
00809 
00810     BLI_assert(ELEM(TRUE, FALSE, test_for_enabled));
00811 
00812     if (test_for_enabled)
00813         totelement = BMO_mesh_enabled_flag_count(bm, htype, oflag);
00814     else
00815         totelement = BMO_mesh_disabled_flag_count(bm, htype, oflag);
00816 
00817     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00818 
00819     if (totelement) {
00820         BMIter iter;
00821         BMHeader *ele;
00822         BMHeader **ele_array;
00823 
00824         bmo_slot_buffer_alloc(op, slotname, totelement);
00825 
00826         ele_array = (BMHeader **)slot->data.p;
00827 
00828         /* TODO - collapse these loops into one */
00829 
00830         if (htype & BM_VERT) {
00831             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00832                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test_bool(bm, (BMElemF *)ele, oflag) == test_for_enabled) {
00833                     ele_array[i] = ele;
00834                     i++;
00835                 }
00836             }
00837         }
00838 
00839         if (htype & BM_EDGE) {
00840             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00841                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test_bool(bm, (BMElemF *)ele, oflag) == test_for_enabled) {
00842                     ele_array[i] = ele;
00843                     i++;
00844                 }
00845             }
00846         }
00847 
00848         if (htype & BM_FACE) {
00849             BM_ITER_MESH (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00850                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test_bool(bm, (BMElemF *)ele, oflag) == test_for_enabled) {
00851                     ele_array[i] = ele;
00852                     i++;
00853                 }
00854             }
00855         }
00856     }
00857     else {
00858         slot->len = 0;
00859     }
00860 }
00861 
00862 void BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00863                                        const char htype, const short oflag)
00864 {
00865     bmo_slot_buffer_from_flag(bm, op, slotname, htype, oflag, TRUE);
00866 }
00867 
00868 void BMO_slot_buffer_from_disabled_flag(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00869                                         const char htype, const short oflag)
00870 {
00871     bmo_slot_buffer_from_flag(bm, op, slotname, htype, oflag, FALSE);
00872 }
00873 
00880 void BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_enable(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00881                                   const char htype, const char hflag, const char do_flush)
00882 {
00883     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00884     BMElem **data =  slot->data.p;
00885     int i;
00886     const char do_flush_select = (do_flush && (hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT));
00887     const char do_flush_hide = (do_flush && (hflag & BM_ELEM_HIDDEN));
00888 
00889     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00890 
00891     for (i = 0; i < slot->len; i++, data++) {
00892         if (!(htype & (*data)->head.htype))
00893             continue;
00894 
00895         if (do_flush_select) {
00896             BM_elem_select_set(bm, *data, TRUE);
00897         }
00898 
00899         if (do_flush_hide) {
00900             BM_elem_hide_set(bm, *data, FALSE);
00901         }
00902 
00903         BM_elem_flag_enable(*data, hflag);
00904     }
00905 }
00906 
00913 void BMO_slot_buffer_hflag_disable(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00914                                    const char htype, const char hflag, const char do_flush)
00915 {
00916     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00917     BMElem **data =  slot->data.p;
00918     int i;
00919     const char do_flush_select = (do_flush && (hflag & BM_ELEM_SELECT));
00920     const char do_flush_hide = (do_flush && (hflag & BM_ELEM_HIDDEN));
00921 
00922     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00923 
00924     for (i = 0; i < slot->len; i++, data++) {
00925         if (!(htype & (*data)->head.htype))
00926             continue;
00927 
00928         if (do_flush_select) {
00929             BM_elem_select_set(bm, *data, FALSE);
00930         }
00931 
00932         if (do_flush_hide) {
00933             BM_elem_hide_set(bm, *data, FALSE);
00934         }
00935 
00936         BM_elem_flag_disable(*data, hflag);
00937     }
00938 }
00939 
00940 int BMO_vert_edge_flags_count(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, const short oflag)
00941 {
00942     int count = 0;
00943 
00944     if (v->e) {
00945         BMEdge *curedge;
00946         const int len = bmesh_disk_count(v);
00947         int i;
00948         
00949         for (i = 0, curedge = v->e; i < len; i++) {
00950             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, curedge, oflag))
00951                 count++;
00952             curedge = bmesh_disk_edge_next(curedge, v);
00953         }
00954     }
00955 
00956     return count;
00957 }
00958 
00964 void BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00965                                  const char htype, const short oflag)
00966 {
00967     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00968     BMHeader **data =  slot->data.p;
00969     int i;
00970 
00971     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00972 
00973     for (i = 0; i < slot->len; i++) {
00974         if (!(htype & data[i]->htype))
00975             continue;
00976 
00977         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, (BMElemF *)data[i], oflag);
00978     }
00979 }
00980 
00986 void BMO_slot_buffer_flag_disable(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *slotname,
00987                                   const char htype, const short oflag)
00988 {
00989     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
00990     BMHeader **data =  slot->data.p;
00991     int i;
00992 
00993     BLI_assert(slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF);
00994 
00995     for (i = 0; i < slot->len; i++) {
00996         if (!(htype & data[i]->htype))
00997             continue;
00998 
00999         BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, (BMElemF *)data[i], oflag);
01000     }
01001 }
01002 
01003 
01017 static void bmo_flag_layer_alloc(BMesh *bm)
01018 {
01019     BMElemF *ele;
01020     /* set the index values since we are looping over all data anyway,
01021      * may save time later on */
01022     int i;
01023 
01024     BMIter iter;
01025     BLI_mempool *oldpool = bm->toolflagpool;        /* old flag pool */
01026     BLI_mempool *newpool;
01027     void *oldflags;
01028 
01029     /* store memcpy size for reuse */
01030     const size_t old_totflags_size = (bm->totflags * sizeof(BMFlagLayer));
01031     
01032     bm->totflags++;
01033 
01034     /* allocate new flag poo */
01035     bm->toolflagpool = newpool = BLI_mempool_create(sizeof(BMFlagLayer) * bm->totflags, 512, 512, 0);
01036     
01037     /* now go through and memcpy all the flags. Loops don't get a flag layer at this time.. */
01038     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
01039         oldflags = ele->oflags;
01040         ele->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(newpool);
01041         memcpy(ele->oflags, oldflags, old_totflags_size);
01042         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01043     }
01044     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, i) {
01045         oldflags = ele->oflags;
01046         ele->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(newpool);
01047         memcpy(ele->oflags, oldflags, old_totflags_size);
01048         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01049     }
01050     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, i) {
01051         oldflags = ele->oflags;
01052         ele->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(newpool);
01053         memcpy(ele->oflags, oldflags, old_totflags_size);
01054         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01055     }
01056 
01057     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~(BM_VERT|BM_EDGE|BM_FACE);
01058 
01059     BLI_mempool_destroy(oldpool);
01060 }
01061 
01062 static void bmo_flag_layer_free(BMesh *bm)
01063 {
01064     BMElemF *ele;
01065     /* set the index values since we are looping over all data anyway,
01066      * may save time later on */
01067     int i;
01068 
01069     BMIter iter;
01070     BLI_mempool *oldpool = bm->toolflagpool;
01071     BLI_mempool *newpool;
01072     void *oldflags;
01073     
01074     /* store memcpy size for reuse */
01075     const size_t new_totflags_size = ((bm->totflags - 1) * sizeof(BMFlagLayer));
01076 
01077     /* de-increment the totflags first.. */
01078     bm->totflags--;
01079     /* allocate new flag poo */
01080     bm->toolflagpool = newpool = BLI_mempool_create(new_totflags_size, 512, 512, BLI_MEMPOOL_SYSMALLOC);
01081     
01082     /* now go through and memcpy all the flag */
01083     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
01084         oldflags = ele->oflags;
01085         ele->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(newpool);
01086         memcpy(ele->oflags, oldflags, new_totflags_size);
01087         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01088     }
01089     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, i) {
01090         oldflags = ele->oflags;
01091         ele->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(newpool);
01092         memcpy(ele->oflags, oldflags, new_totflags_size);
01093         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01094     }
01095     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, i) {
01096         oldflags = ele->oflags;
01097         ele->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(newpool);
01098         memcpy(ele->oflags, oldflags, new_totflags_size);
01099         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01100     }
01101 
01102     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~(BM_VERT|BM_EDGE|BM_FACE);
01103 
01104     BLI_mempool_destroy(oldpool);
01105 }
01106 
01107 static void bmo_flag_layer_clear(BMesh *bm)
01108 {
01109     BMElemF *ele;
01110     /* set the index values since we are looping over all data anyway,
01111      * may save time later on */
01112     int i;
01113 
01114     BMIter iter;
01115     const int totflags_offset = bm->totflags - 1;
01116 
01117     /* now go through and memcpy all the flag */
01118     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
01119         memset(ele->oflags + totflags_offset, 0, sizeof(BMFlagLayer));
01120         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01121     }
01122     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, i) {
01123         memset(ele->oflags + totflags_offset, 0, sizeof(BMFlagLayer));
01124         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01125     }
01126     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (ele, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, i) {
01127         memset(ele->oflags + totflags_offset, 0, sizeof(BMFlagLayer));
01128         BM_elem_index_set(ele, i); /* set_inline */
01129     }
01130 
01131     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~(BM_VERT|BM_EDGE|BM_FACE);
01132 }
01133 
01134 void *BMO_slot_buffer_elem_first(BMOperator *op, const char *slotname)
01135 {
01136     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
01137     
01138     if (slot->slottype != BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF)
01139         return NULL;
01140 
01141     return slot->data.buf ? *(void **)slot->data.buf : NULL;
01142 }
01143 
01150 void *BMO_iter_new(BMOIter *iter, BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMOperator *op,
01151                    const char *slotname, const char restrictmask)
01152 {
01153     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
01154 
01155     memset(iter, 0, sizeof(BMOIter));
01156 
01157     iter->slot = slot;
01158     iter->cur = 0;
01159     iter->restrictmask = restrictmask;
01160 
01161     if (iter->slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING) {
01162         if (iter->slot->data.ghash) {
01163             BLI_ghashIterator_init(&iter->giter, slot->data.ghash);
01164         }
01165         else {
01166             return NULL;
01167         }
01168     }
01169 
01170     return BMO_iter_step(iter);
01171 }
01172 
01173 void *BMO_iter_step(BMOIter *iter)
01174 {
01175     if (iter->slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_ELEMENT_BUF) {
01176         BMHeader *h;
01177 
01178         if (iter->cur >= iter->slot->len) {
01179             return NULL;
01180         }
01181 
01182         h = ((void **)iter->slot->data.buf)[iter->cur++];
01183         while (!(iter->restrictmask & h->htype)) {
01184             if (iter->cur >= iter->slot->len) {
01185                 return NULL;
01186             }
01187 
01188             h = ((void **)iter->slot->data.buf)[iter->cur++];
01189         }
01190 
01191         return h;
01192     }
01193     else if (iter->slot->slottype == BMO_OP_SLOT_MAPPING) {
01194         BMOElemMapping *map;
01195         void *ret = BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(&iter->giter);
01196         map = BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(&iter->giter);
01197         
01198         iter->val = map + 1;
01199 
01200         BLI_ghashIterator_step(&iter->giter);
01201 
01202         return ret;
01203     }
01204 
01205     return NULL;
01206 }
01207 
01208 /* used for iterating over mapping */
01209 void *BMO_iter_map_value(BMOIter *iter)
01210 {
01211     return iter->val;
01212 }
01213 
01214 void *BMO_iter_map_value_p(BMOIter *iter)
01215 {
01216     return *((void **)iter->val);
01217 }
01218 
01219 float BMO_iter_map_value_f(BMOIter *iter)
01220 {
01221     return *((float *)iter->val);
01222 }
01223 
01224 /* error syste */
01225 typedef struct BMOpError {
01226     struct BMOpError *next, *prev;
01227     int errorcode;
01228     BMOperator *op;
01229     const char *msg;
01230 } BMOpError;
01231 
01232 void BMO_error_clear(BMesh *bm)
01233 {
01234     while (BMO_error_pop(bm, NULL, NULL));
01235 }
01236 
01237 void BMO_error_raise(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *owner, int errcode, const char *msg)
01238 {
01239     BMOpError *err = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMOpError), "bmop_error");
01240     
01241     err->errorcode = errcode;
01242     if (!msg) msg = bmo_error_messages[errcode];
01243     err->msg = msg;
01244     err->op = owner;
01245     
01246     BLI_addhead(&bm->errorstack, err);
01247 }
01248 
01249 int BMO_error_occurred(BMesh *bm)
01250 {
01251     return bm->errorstack.first != NULL;
01252 }
01253 
01254 /* returns error code or 0 if no erro */
01255 int BMO_error_get(BMesh *bm, const char **msg, BMOperator **op)
01256 {
01257     BMOpError *err = bm->errorstack.first;
01258     if (!err) {
01259         return 0;
01260     }
01261 
01262     if (msg) *msg = err->msg;
01263     if (op) *op = err->op;
01264     
01265     return err->errorcode;
01266 }
01267 
01268 int BMO_error_pop(BMesh *bm, const char **msg, BMOperator **op)
01269 {
01270     int errorcode = BMO_error_get(bm, msg, op);
01271     
01272     if (errorcode) {
01273         BMOpError *err = bm->errorstack.first;
01274         
01275         BLI_remlink(&bm->errorstack, bm->errorstack.first);
01276         MEM_freeN(err);
01277     }
01278 
01279     return errorcode;
01280 }
01281 
01282 
01283 #define NEXT_CHAR(fmt) ((fmt)[0] != 0 ? (fmt)[1] : 0)
01284 
01285 static int bmo_name_to_slotcode(BMOpDefine *def, const char *name)
01286 {
01287     int i;
01288 
01289     for (i = 0; def->slottypes[i].type; i++) {
01290         if (!strncmp(name, def->slottypes[i].name, MAX_SLOTNAME)) {
01291             return i;
01292         }
01293     }
01294 
01295     return -1;
01296 }
01297 
01298 static int bmo_name_to_slotcode_check(BMOpDefine *def, const char *name)
01299 {
01300     int i = bmo_name_to_slotcode(def, name);
01301     if (i < 0) {
01302         fprintf(stderr, "%s: ! could not find bmesh slot for name %s! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__, name);
01303     }
01304 
01305     return i;
01306 }
01307 
01308 static int bmo_opname_to_opcode(const char *opname)
01309 {
01310     int i;
01311 
01312     for (i = 0; i < bmesh_total_ops; i++) {
01313         if (!strcmp(opname, opdefines[i]->name)) {
01314             return i;
01315         }
01316     }
01317 
01318     fprintf(stderr, "%s: ! could not find bmesh slot for name %s! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__, opname);
01319     return -1;
01320 }
01321 
01322 /* Example:
01323  * BMO_op_callf(bm, "del %i %hv", DEL_ONLYFACES, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01324  *
01325  *  i - int
01326  *  b - boolean (same as int but 1/0 only)
01327  *  f - float
01328  *  hv - header flagged verts (hflag)
01329  *  he - header flagged edges (hflag)
01330  *  hf - header flagged faces (hflag)
01331  *  fv - flagged verts (oflag)
01332  *  fe - flagged edges (oflag)
01333  *  ff - flagged faces (oflag)
01334  */
01335 
01336 int BMO_op_vinitf(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *_fmt, va_list vlist)
01337 {
01338     BMOpDefine *def;
01339     char *opname, *ofmt, *fmt;
01340     char slotname[64] = {0};
01341     int i /*, n = strlen(fmt) */, stop /*, slotcode = -1 */, type, state;
01342     char htype;
01343     int noslot = 0;
01344 
01345 
01346     /* basic useful info to help find where bmop formatting strings fail */
01347     const char *err_reason = "Unknown";
01348     int lineno = -1;
01349 
01350 #define GOTO_ERROR(reason)   \
01351     {                        \
01352         err_reason = reason; \
01353         lineno = __LINE__;   \
01354         goto error;          \
01355     } (void)0
01356 
01357     /* we muck around in here, so dup i */
01358     fmt = ofmt = BLI_strdup(_fmt);
01359     
01360     /* find operator name */
01361     i = strcspn(fmt, " ");
01362 
01363     opname = fmt;
01364     if (!opname[i]) noslot = 1;
01365     opname[i] = '\0';
01366 
01367     fmt += i + (noslot ? 0 : 1);
01368     
01369     i = bmo_opname_to_opcode(opname);
01370 
01371     if (i == -1) {
01372         MEM_freeN(ofmt);
01373         return FALSE;
01374     }
01375 
01376     BMO_op_init(bm, op, opname);
01377     def = opdefines[i];
01378     
01379     i = 0;
01380     state = 1; /* 0: not inside slotcode name, 1: inside slotcode name */
01381 
01382     while (*fmt) {
01383         if (state) {
01384             /* jump past leading whitespac */
01385             i = strspn(fmt, " ");
01386             fmt += i;
01387             
01388             /* ignore trailing whitespac */
01389             if (!fmt[i])
01390                 break;
01391 
01392             /* find end of slot name, only "slot=%f", can be used */
01393             i = strcspn(fmt, "=");
01394             if (!fmt[i]) {
01395                 GOTO_ERROR("could not match end of slot name");
01396             }
01397 
01398             fmt[i] = 0;
01399 
01400             if (bmo_name_to_slotcode_check(def, fmt) < 0) {
01401                 GOTO_ERROR("name to slot code check failed");
01402             }
01403             
01404             BLI_strncpy(slotname, fmt, sizeof(slotname));
01405             
01406             state = 0;
01407             fmt += i;
01408         }
01409         else {
01410             switch (*fmt) {
01411                 case ' ':
01412                 case '=':
01413                 case '%':
01414                     break;
01415                 case 'm': {
01416                     int size, c;
01417 
01418                     c = NEXT_CHAR(fmt);
01419                     fmt++;
01420 
01421                     if      (c == '3') size = 3;
01422                     else if (c == '4') size = 4;
01423                     else GOTO_ERROR("matrix size was not 3 or 4");
01424 
01425                     BMO_slot_mat_set(op, slotname, va_arg(vlist, void *), size);
01426                     state = 1;
01427                     break;
01428                 }
01429                 case 'v': {
01430                     BMO_slot_vec_set(op, slotname, va_arg(vlist, float *));
01431                     state = 1;
01432                     break;
01433                 }
01434                 case 'e': {
01435                     BMHeader *ele = va_arg(vlist, void *);
01436                     BMOpSlot *slot = BMO_slot_get(op, slotname);
01437 
01438                     slot->data.buf = BLI_memarena_alloc(op->arena, sizeof(void *) * 4);
01439                     slot->len = 1;
01440                     *((void **)slot->data.buf) = ele;
01441 
01442                     state = 1;
01443                     break;
01444                 }
01445                 case 's': {
01446                     BMOperator *op2 = va_arg(vlist, void *);
01447                     const char *slotname2 = va_arg(vlist, char *);
01448 
01449                     BMO_slot_copy(op2, op, slotname2, slotname);
01450                     state = 1;
01451                     break;
01452                 }
01453                 case 'i':
01454                     BMO_slot_int_set(op, slotname, va_arg(vlist, int));
01455                     state = 1;
01456                     break;
01457                 case 'b':
01458                     BMO_slot_bool_set(op, slotname, va_arg(vlist, int));
01459                     state = 1;
01460                     break;
01461                 case 'p':
01462                     BMO_slot_ptr_set(op, slotname, va_arg(vlist, void *));
01463                     state = 1;
01464                     break;
01465                 case 'f':
01466                 case 'F':
01467                 case 'h':
01468                 case 'H':
01469                 case 'a':
01470                     type = *fmt;
01471 
01472                     if (NEXT_CHAR(fmt) == ' ' || NEXT_CHAR(fmt) == '\0') {
01473                         BMO_slot_float_set(op, slotname, va_arg(vlist, double));
01474                     }
01475                     else {
01476                         htype = 0;
01477                         stop = 0;
01478                         while (1) {
01479                             switch (NEXT_CHAR(fmt)) {
01480                                 case 'f': htype |= BM_FACE; break;
01481                                 case 'e': htype |= BM_EDGE; break;
01482                                 case 'v': htype |= BM_VERT; break;
01483                                 default:
01484                                     stop = 1;
01485                                     break;
01486                             }
01487                             if (stop) {
01488                                 break;
01489                             }
01490 
01491                             fmt++;
01492                         }
01493 
01494                         if (type == 'h') {
01495                             BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_hflag(bm, op, slotname, htype, va_arg(vlist, int));
01496                         }
01497                         else if (type == 'H') {
01498                             BMO_slot_buffer_from_disabled_hflag(bm, op, slotname, htype, va_arg(vlist, int));
01499                         }
01500                         else if (type == 'a') {
01501                             BMO_slot_buffer_from_all(bm, op, slotname, htype);
01502                         }
01503                         else if (type == 'f') {
01504                             BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, slotname, htype, va_arg(vlist, int));
01505                         }
01506                         else if (type == 'F') {
01507                             BMO_slot_buffer_from_disabled_flag(bm, op, slotname, htype, va_arg(vlist, int));
01508                         }
01509                     }
01510 
01511                     state = 1;
01512                     break;
01513                 default:
01514                     fprintf(stderr,
01515                             "%s: unrecognized bmop format char: %c, %d in '%s'\n",
01516                             __func__, *fmt, (int)(fmt - ofmt), ofmt);
01517                     break;
01518             }
01519         }
01520         fmt++;
01521     }
01522 
01523     MEM_freeN(ofmt);
01524     return TRUE;
01525 error:
01526 
01527     /* non urgent todo - explain exactly what is failing */
01528     fprintf(stderr, "%s: error parsing formatting string\n", __func__);
01529 
01530     fprintf(stderr, "string: '%s', position %d\n", _fmt, (int)(fmt - ofmt));
01531     fprintf(stderr, "         ");
01532     {
01533         int pos = (int)(fmt - ofmt);
01534         int i;
01535         for (i = 0; i < pos; i++) {
01536             fprintf(stderr, " ");
01537         }
01538         fprintf(stderr, "^\n");
01539     }
01540 
01541     fprintf(stderr, "source code:  %s:%d\n", __FILE__, lineno);
01542 
01543     fprintf(stderr, "reason: %s\n", err_reason);
01544 
01545 
01546     MEM_freeN(ofmt);
01547 
01548     BMO_op_finish(bm, op);
01549     return FALSE;
01550 
01551 #undef GOTO_ERROR
01552 
01553 }
01554 
01555 
01556 int BMO_op_initf(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, const char *fmt, ...)
01557 {
01558     va_list list;
01559 
01560     va_start(list, fmt);
01561     if (!BMO_op_vinitf(bm, op, fmt, list)) {
01562         printf("%s: failed\n", __func__);
01563         va_end(list);
01564         return FALSE;
01565     }
01566     va_end(list);
01567 
01568     return TRUE;
01569 }
01570 
01571 int BMO_op_callf(BMesh *bm, const char *fmt, ...)
01572 {
01573     va_list list;
01574     BMOperator op;
01575 
01576     va_start(list, fmt);
01577     if (!BMO_op_vinitf(bm, &op, fmt, list)) {
01578         printf("%s: failed, format is:\n    \"%s\"\n", __func__, fmt);
01579         va_end(list);
01580         return FALSE;
01581     }
01582 
01583     BMO_op_exec(bm, &op);
01584     BMO_op_finish(bm, &op);
01585 
01586     va_end(list);
01587     return TRUE;
01588 }
